entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 this morning then rising. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 6 this morning then rising. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
